website_summaries.verdict: Perfect football size for preteens to learn to throw using proper technique.
pros: Composite material on laces with pebbled surface allows for better grip
Composite ball surface also pebbled to make it easier for children to catch and grip
Good price point for a ball from trusted brand name
cons: Football may not hold its shape as well as a regular-size ball

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, for a kid
customer_reviews.text: Don't confuse this with the official size, but for a 12 year old, it's perfect. Don't worry about it not being real leather, it feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Friedman

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for 14 and under flag football
customer_reviews.text: Not just the size but shape and quality of make is much better than even the most expensive one at "that" famous brick and mortar sports store.
customer_reviews.author: John Ikaika

customer_reviews.title: For your junior football player
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Grandson for his birthday. He loves it!! Just his size too! Quality made!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: Good football
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this one best. We have 8 footballs and this one spins the best and has a great grip. The grip will lessen over time. This us the 2nd one we have purchased and first from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: guest

customer_reviews.title: great size for my son who is 9
customer_reviews.text: durable, great size for my son who is 9, and myself!
customer_reviews.author: DPT from WNC

customer_reviews.title: Nice football
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew, and he loves it. The ball is very well made, and has a nice feel. Professional!
customer_reviews.author: JimCool

customer_reviews.title: thanks
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for our flag football league. Now it is my boys favorite football to play with and we have a ton to choose from!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanee

customer_reviews.title: kid size and grippy
customer_reviews.text: Good size for 6-12 year old. Grppy and not too hard for dad-kid play. My wife prefers the smaller size also
customer_reviews.author: dieter

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOOTBALL
customer_reviews.text: Smooth leather football, very nice grip, professional shape everything was ok with this product, arrived on time, well packed and just what I expected when bought
customer_reviews.author: Batoro

customer_reviews.title: A really nice football for the price.  Great look and fantastic grip.
customer_reviews.text: A great quality junior football with no obvious flaws or defects. It came fully inflated, or nearly so. A very nice ball, good feel. I have small hands, so it fit me well. My grand-nephew really loves it. Does not come with a pump so order a small inexpensive pump if you don't have one.
customer_reviews.author: Joel C.

customer_reviews.title: GIft for Grandson
customer_reviews.text: He is an avid sports pre-teen. Granddad bought this football for him. Will use when weather better. Now snowing today.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kerlin

customer_reviews.title: Great football
customer_reviews.text: Extremely gripy, exellent football for the price and you don't have to be scared of catching a bullet pass because of its soft lether.
customer_reviews.author: jaziel

customer_reviews.title: Much better grip than the other Wilson pleather footballs
customer_reviews.text: Much better grip than the other Wilson pleather footballs. It doesn't get slippery when the ball is wet your your hands are sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: CAD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to throw. Still looks new. Holds up. Terrific product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: 🌹

customer_reviews.title: atypical, but cool . . .
customer_reviews.text: This junior size ball is well made, and the composite leather material has a great look and feel. The color is light brown, and the laces are black, a different look from the standard regulation NFL football. The photo makes the ball look a lighter shade of brown than it actually is. If the atypical appearance is not an issue, this is a great ball to either throw or catch. Well-suited for teens, or anyone with smaller hands.
customer_reviews.author: trebe

product_meta.title: Wilson Ultimate Composite NFL Junior Football
product_meta.description: Wilson Ultimate Composite NFL Junior Size football is made of a Grip composite leather with a high performance durable cover that provides outstanding grip and feel for the ultimate competitor. The Ultimate Composite NFL Junior football has ACL Laces.
feature_bullets: High-quality composite football for 9 to 12 year olds
Composite leather cover with high-definition pebble surface
Provides high-quality grip for superior aim and control
Pebbled composite laces provide 174 percent more grip
Includes Wilson graphic and official NFL logo
